pages.text: $(thing)Spanish moss$() is a plant artificially created in a $(l:tools/cauldron)cauldron$() (with a whiff of literal $(thing)witchcraft$()). It can be planted on almost any solid surface, and will spread viciously.

<insert recipe here>$(br)Creating spanish moss$(br2)B-BAKA <_< $(br2)IT'S N-NOT LIKE I L-LIKE YOU OR SOMETHING..! $(br)BUT COULD YOU JUST ADD MY RECIPE TO THIS ENTRY...$(o)PLEASE$()...B-$(l)BAKA!$() >_>
